name: Giant Wolf Spider
description: The Giant Wolf Spider is a fast predator covered in dark, bristly hairs with multiple eyes for detecting movement.
memorable: Unique ambush predator that relies on speed and venomous bite to subdue prey.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey within its territory.
relations: May encounter other solitary predators or be found in the company of lesser spiders.
strengths: High dexterity enhancing stealth and evasion; capable of quickly traversing various terrains.
weaknesses: Low hit points and intelligence, making it vulnerable to clever tactics.
attacks: Bite attack that deals piercing damage and can paralyze its target with poison.
most_powerful_ability: Venomous bite that can incapacitate prey and keep them paralyzed even after stabilizing.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even in darkness or through obstacles.
skills: Has a strong proficiency in stealth, allowing it to approach enemies unnoticed.
additional_information: Climbs effectively on walls and ceilings with Spider Climb ability.
Uses webs to detect prey within its vicinity through Web Sense.
Unhindered by webbing, allowing easier movement in spider habitats.
